attributes.action: Change the Criminal Justice Act of 2003 So Offenders With A Determinate Sentence Can't Serve Half in Prison And Half In Community
attributes.additional_details: Change the Criminal Justice Act 2003, so offenders cannot serve half their term in prison and half in the community. This is a act which allows Paedophiles to serve only the minimum sentence to be released early into the community. Where is the Justice for their victims?
